title: Simply Works
comment: Been using this for 3 large family trips now.

title: Very good app
comment: If you could add a description field for transfer transaction same as the one for the payment to make some notes for what you transfer the money for the other person. Thanks and hope to see it soon
I have added this to the feature wishlist. Thanks for your feedback

title: The best and the most useful android app I ever have used
comment: I never write reviews. But I have to do it for this app. I'm a very frequent traveller and that too with friends. This is the best app ( after trying lot many ) for the job . easy to use , very powerful , very convenient for ppl who travel on a sharing basis. Suggestions to the dev : 1. see if u can make it in different colour schemes 2. The types, if I could edit it and make my own 3. A Widget would be lovely to access 4. Format creation option for overall view would be lovely. Awesome work guys .

Thanks for your response: A more modern colour scheme came along with 1.5, Custom payment types is on the feature wishlist and likely one of the next features. Unfortunately I don't fully understand your expectations behind your suggestion 3.) and 4.) If you find the time send me an email on those.

title: Very Good Application
comment: Liked the way the expenses are managed

title: Bingo!
comment: Was just looking for this type of app. Thank you!

title: Add One
comment: Nicely designed. Even have reports in it. Wen we select custom split please keep check boxes beside persons n a check box at the bottom on top of 'create' button to split evenly, which i guess wud be very comfrtabe..thanks for App :)

title: Great so far
comment: Haven't left on the trip yet, will update rating on return. Only thing I can see missing is editing categories, but not huge with description available.

title: Very good app
comment: Especially liked the split expense reporting

title: Wicked Apps!
comment: Thank you for creating such as useful apps. It really help me to organize budgeting when travel in a group. 5 stars if the payment source setting can be from more than 1 person.

Payment source already can be from more than 1: Just hit the arrow button on top of the payment dialog and select the payers of your choice. - Your remark might also imply, that you request a new feature which would allow you to store a default payment source setting consiting of more than one specific traveller: I will put that on the wishlist.
Simple and Perfect App

title: Too early to judge
comment: No dates, no currencies, no calculators... A good start, but when it can compete I guess it will become paid as well :P

A currency calculator and exchange rate management had been added with previous releases.
Today with release 1.4.2 a payment date edit functionality has been added.

title: Perfect solution for me...
comment: When day outing with 3-4 friends its always difficult to keep the track of expenses by each person and dived the cost between @ the end. Tricky Tripper was a perfect solution for me cos i don't need full accounting facility  on this situation. Only drawback for me is that i cant have my currency type. I don't need currency exchange but like to have my currency type (Rs.) except for ($).  Export functionality is GREAT. and really useful for me to handle trip budgets. also the currency and default currency setting :)  New request:- when we adding new person after starting the trip the costs r not divided from that point onward. so can u make a way to update the previous costs to him also.

The feature to define your trips default currency has been added with release 1.2.3.
The exchange rate management has been added with release 1.3.0.
Your feature request has been added to my feature request list.

title: Everything I have expected
comment: ...if you could only add the 'several currencies' feature. I want to enter the exchange rate globally and to add payments in other currency.

An entire exchange rate management has been added with release 1.3.0. of 2013-01-11.
Since then you can enter your own currency exchange rates or import them, in case you have a online connection.
So: Tricky Tripper allows you to enter your payment into various currencies.The calculator transfers the amount into the currency of your trip.

title: The best of its kind
comment: I have now tried all apps in this category and this one is the best. Simple and easy to use. My wish list: several currencies, view detailed report (why not add View in browser to the export function?), add latitude and longitude to expenses,  add date and time to them as well!

The currency feature is complete since release 1.3.0.
The feature to amend and display the date and time of a payment has just been added (1.4.2).
Tricky Tripper might record the coordinates of a payment in the future. Neventheless its main concept is to be offline compatible, i.e. I am not intending to include Google Maps or something similar.
Amazing tricks

title: looks very usefull
comment: i have installed this application and the application looks very useful and simple. I think this application will help me to record ma expenses and track the expenses each person has made.
